channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Mud on road, 14th November
item.description:
There is an excess of mud along Bamfurlong Lane (and across the airport) and when it is wet it becomes dangerously slippery, especially for cyclists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bamfurlong Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The entire pavement from Pegasus Ct to the junction with Hatherley Court Road is dangerously patched and uneven, so surfaces are worn away., 14th November
item.description:
Please re level and resurface the entire stretch of pavement. It's really dangerous for the elderly residents around here. It's a very well used pavement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley Court Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Land drain adjacent to no. 5 hathorn road, 13th November
item.description:
Since heavy rain over a month ago - balance pond almost at road level(ducks enjoyed) now gone down this week but second part is still high level and smells stagnent - no cutting back been done for months full of debris / trees - no 19 for sale - buyer pulled out week before exchnage as fear of flooding
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Hathorn Road, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 13th November
item.description:
28 day with 4 way stop and go carriageway pothole . 1000x600x50mm tarmac patch required or best out of hours unable to mark up due to traffic (CW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The sign is illegible problem, 13th November
item.description:
National Speed Limit and 30mph sign broken off at base. Sign not in situ new pole and relative signs need to be erected. Broken off pole currently made safe with cone. Can this please be passed onto the local AHR for the area for necessary job to be raised and carried out .
Report on FixMyStreet
